title: Rxn order of I- from rate law

content.question:
H3AsO4 + 3 I– + 2 H3O+ → H3AsO3 + I3– + H2O

The oxidation of iodide ions by arsenic acid in acidic aqueous solution occurs according to the stoichiometry shown above. The experimental rate law of the reaction is:

Rate = k[H3AsO4] [I–] [H3O+]

What is the order of the reaction with respect to I–?

skill.text: 1.A: Describe the components of and quantitative information from models and representations that illustrate particulate-level properties only.
